item.title: Dangerous broken.uneven, lifted paving slabs on entire pavement of street. Grosvenor Place South., 26th August
item.description:
Outside 18 Grosvenor Place South plus the length & breadth of the street the uneven & loose & broken slabs are now exceedingly dangerous resulting in tripping & falling of pedestrians. This is a persistent problem as the slabs become even more dangerous. They all need replacing sooner rather than later. Long overdue as Iâ€™m told the state of the pavement has been reported before.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18;18A, Grosvenor Place South, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
